name: REPULS
description:
REPULS is a passion project conceived in my highschool years.

It's a halo inspired fast paced arena shooter with a focus on balanced predictable gameplay. 

The game is in active development and new features and content are being conceived and added on a monthly basis.

Content:

  • 10+ weapons (shotgun, sniper rifle, grenade launcher)
  • 7 equipment (grapple, grenades, EMP, mine)
  • 5 maps
  • 4+ game modes
  • clan system
